channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- LaTeX for WordPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- LaTeX for WordPress

item.title: CVE-2022-1780|2024-08-03T00:16:59.855Z -- unknown -- latex%20for%20wordpress
item.description: The LaTeX for WordPress plugin through 3.4.10 does not have CSRF check in place when updating its settings, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change them via a CSRF attack which could also lead to Stored Cross-Site Scripting due to the lack of sanitisation and escaping
